page.description: Suspends the execution of a script.
page.discussion: STOP suspends the execution of a script. Note : If you want to cause a run-time error that can be trapped by an ON ERROR GOTO statement, use the ERROR_GENERATE() command.

section.title: Example
section.example: trace.writeln("Start") for x = 1 TO 10 if x = 3 then stop end if trace.writeln(STR(x)) next x trace.writeln("End") end
